# Provision Land & Properties Ltd

> Premium real estate company in Kenya offering genuine land for sale with ready title deeds.

## Company Information
- **Name:** Provision Land & Properties Ltd
- **Website:** https://provisionlands.co.ke
- **Phone:** +254 797 331 355
- **Email:** info@provisionlands.co.ke
- **Address:** Clairbourn Towers, 5th Floor, Thika, Kenya
- **Tagline:** "We Promise and Deliver Genuinely"

## Location
- **Region:** Kiambu County, Kenya
- **City:** Thika
- **Coordinates:** -1.035323, 37.074561
- **Google Maps:** [View Location](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Provision+Land+%26+Properties+Ltd)

## Services Offered
1. **Land Sales** - Prime plots in high-growth areas (Thika, Murang'a, Machakos) with ready title deeds
2. **Property Valuation** - Accurate and professional land and building valuation
3. **Real Estate Management** - Comprehensive property management solutions
4. **Consultancy** - Expert advice on land banking, agribusiness, and residential development

## Key Areas We Serve
- Thika (Ngoingwa, Landless, Mang'u, Gatuanyaga)
- Murang'a (Kiharu, Ithanga, Makuyu, Sagana)
- Machakos (Matuu)
- Kilimambogo / Oldonyo Sabuk
- Mwingi
